name: The Pirate Bay - Into the depths of darkness
description:
A dark redesign of The Pirate Bay. Also gets rid of those awful ads.

V0.3 - Fixed an ad I somehow missed.
V0.4 - August 28 2008 - Been a long time, whoops. Updated with some small fixes.
V0.5 - January 22 2009 - Boy do I ever neglect this thing. Fixed some more small issues with the blog and some other sections.
